translations: 幽默作家；富于幽默感的人

sentences.sentence: Madge smiled at him. The man was evidently a humorist.
sentences.translation: 马奇对他笑了笑，心想这个人实在是太幽默了。

sentences.sentence: When referring to gray hair, the famous English humorist named P.
sentences.translation: 说起花白的头发，英国著名的幽默大师P。

sentences.sentence: P.J. o 'rourke, of course, is an author, satirist and humorist.
sentences.translation: 奥罗克，当然了，是一名作家，讽刺家，幽默家。
